biz.pavonis.hexameter.api

Interface HexagonalGridCalculator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HexagonalGridCalculatorImpl

    public interface HexagonalGridCalculator
    Supports common operations on a HexagonalGrid. Operations supported:
    • Calculating distance between 2 Hexagons.
    • Calsulating movement range from a Hexagon using an arbitrary distance.
    Not implemented yet, but are on the roadmap:
    • Calculating movement range with obstacles
    • Calculating field of view
    • Pathfinding between two Hexagons (using obstacles)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int calculateDistanceBetween(Hexagon hex0, Hexagon hex1)
      Calculates the distance (in hexagons) between two Hexagon objects on the grid.
      java.util.Set<Hexagon> calculateMovementRangeFrom(Hexagon hexagon, int distance)
      Returns all Hexagons which are within distance (inclusive) from the Hexagon.
      int calculateObstacleDistanceBetween(Hexagon hex0, Hexagon hex1)
      Calculates the distance (in hexagons) between two Hexagon objects on the grid considering the presence of obstacles.
      java.util.Set<Hexagon> calculateObstacleMovementRangeFrom(Hexagon hexagon, int distance)
      Returns all Hexagons which are within distance (inclusive) from the Hexagon considering presence of obstacles.
